text: NGC 392 is a lenticular galaxy located in the constellation Pisces. It was discovered on September 12, 1784 by William Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "faint, very small, round, much brighter middle, between 2 stars." ==References== ==External links== * 0392 04042 00700 +05-03-062 17840912 Category:Pisces (constellation) Category:Discoveries by William Herschel
title: NGC 392
